summary: This mod provide a more powerful version of two artifacts by editing their enchantment and value.
descriptionHtml:
Before I made this mod, I have been using otherartifact enhancing mod by other which I enjoyed very much.

As I failed to findsome suitable mod for those two artifacts, Volendrung and Molag
Bal,(some are quite too powerful to me)
I decided to mademy own modification and here it is.
 
 For Molag Bal,
 The enhancement cost is reduced from 84 to 60which allows 50 uses (origanl: 35)
 Bleeding damage effect is added to it, thedamage increases with your level
 
 For level lower than 16 (1-15), the bleedingdamage is 3 per second for a duration of 5 seconds
 For level between 15 to 31 (16-30) , thebleeding damage is 5 per second for a duration of 5 seconds
 For level greater than 30 (31 and above) ,the bleeding damage is 8 per second for a duration of 5 seconds
 
 the effect for the stamina magika damage andsoul trap effect remains unchanged. (25 damage to stamina and magika and 3
second soul trap)
 
 For Volendrung,
 The enhancement cost is reduced from 129 to100 which allows 30 uses (origanl: 23)
 
 A new effect is added to the hammer, when [b]player is wielding Volendrung[/b] and performing [b]a side power attack[/b], (power attack with left right button)
 the enemy will be thrown for a great distance(the effect is same as the strongest version of unrelenting force)
 
 the effect for the staminaabsorption  remains unchanged. (50 stamina absorption)
 
 For the Volendrung, the unrelenting force effectmight be enabled by the other user when player is using a
duplicate Volendrung from console and player is performing [b]a [/b]side power attack.
 
 
 Last but not least,
 I have edited the soul siphon perk in theenchanting perk tree, there will be a second level of soul siphon which
allows you to trap 15% of the soul.
 (restriction is that the soul is white.....notrecharging in killing people)
 
 I think this can make the perk moreuseful....I used the editted Molag Bal with the level 2 soul siphon fight
30 Falmer Nightprowler and the weapon remains charged throughout the fight.
 So I assume this would be fine.
 
 The editted Volendrung is really fun andmight be even too powerful I think.....
